title: Missing rp
body: I payed with a credit card to get rp it said error but my credit card got the money tranfered off of it so I'm saying I bought rp my credit card used ten dollars and the ten dollars was used but the rp is not in my account.Plese help because otherwise it was a waste of my money

replies.body:
Sometimes when new content releases and it's really popular, all the purchasing transactions happening simultaneously can overload the store and cause weird behavior. Worry not! If you reach out to our billing specialists by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), we'll be able to investigate further and work with you to resolve this.

Let me know if you have any questions.
same for me, but with a pre-paid card, riot's eventually gonna fix the issues, stores having issues since project skin's are out, lets just be patient
Same here. I bought rp charges never got my rp.
Targons Blade why is league of legends more like aids of cancer
